c_p: i turisti hanno perso l ’ autobus .
t_overt: they were on the table yesterday .

c_p: i bambini hanno finito i compiti .

p_overt: loro hanno lasciato entrare il freddo .

c_p: i colleghi hanno criticato il piano .

t_overt: they are waiting in the lounge .
they were on the high shelf .
they got caught in the rain .
